title: Toxic Water From Texas Oil Production Is Set to Be Treated and Pumped into Rivers
description: State environmental regulators are evaluating applications from four companies to release treated Permian Basin wastewater into the Pecos River
content: State environmental regulators are evaluating applications from four companies to release treated Permian Basin wastewater into the Pecos River
